questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: In 10 years i will be an avocant. I hope and will have 2 children. I will be riche because i will work hard. I will travel a lot in the world. I will retourn in Ethiopia and why not stay to live in there. In Ethiopia i will bult a lot bulding for children. i hope so they will happy.
